name: Deadliest Coin Vertical Slice of RPG
name_original: Deadliest Coin Vertical Slice of RPG
description: Its an Arcade Style First Person Shooter RPG  that has magick with a Grappling hook for getting around.  There is no dialogue just pure Gameplay and Leveling.  Your an Invisible Space Wizard with the ability to control time by pressing C.  You have a vast Spellbook from which to purchase from.  Making yourself the Ultimate Mage to defeat ever enhancing enemies that grow as you grow.  All the while finding insane combos of magic and gunfighting in order to defeat your foes.  To use the grappling hook click the right mouse button down and hold. To shoot the gun just click the right mouse button down.  All the things you need are on the screen to help the budding space Mage.
